name: Tetris Fighter
description:
Tetris Fighter is a project based on a simple concept: What if Tetris was a platformer?You control Mino, a tiny green square, who needs to get to a floating Victory Sphere for some reason. A pilgrimage? A quest to find lost love? An arbitrary goal around which the game is based? You decide.Features:
  • 8+ levels of intense, puzzle-platforming action
  • 2+ song soundtrack
  • Local multiplayer
  • Secrets? Maybe. I dunno
Controls:
  • WASD controls Mino
  • Arrow Keys control the falling Tetris pieces
  • Esc brings you back to the main menu

Enjoy!
